categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Andru's daughter was a female Human Sith, who was a daughter and apprentice of Darth Andru, just like her brother. The siblings eventually conspired against their master and poisoned him.
Darth Andru's daughter is mentioned briefly in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on the planet Dromund Kaas.
